name: Setup Git Repository Structure
description: Creates a standard directory structure for Git repositories with appropriate README files and documentation. Supports different repository types including development setup, general projects, documentation, and tools repositories.

arguments.name: github_username
arguments.description: Your GitHub username where the devsetup repository is hosted

arguments.name: repo_name
arguments.description: Name of the repository containing the setup script

arguments.name: repository_type
arguments.description: Type of repository structure to create

arguments.name: repository_name
arguments.description: Name of the repository (used in README title)
